ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Mages soloing..... err Grouping?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... for the missed notes, i would suggest going somewhere and leaving yourself logged in overnight to max your brass skill.  i use a corner in butcherblock
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:36 AM 7/19/00 -0700, you wrote:
>At 18 I had too many missed notes to solo effectively.
>At 19 I soloed aviaks ... altho I did have some
>trouble here and there because they do stun a lot. I
>also went to EF and soloed snow orc shaman and a few
>mamouths. sometimes you'll need to throw on selos and
>bellow a few times to soften the mobs up a bit.
>
>For the record, I was wearing banded and maybe some
>bronze at the time. Normal instruments as well.

for the missed notes, i would suggest going somewhere and leaving yourself logged
in overnight to max your brass skill. i use a corner in butcherblock near the gfay zone
line. you definitely won't have a chance at soloing if everytime you try to start DDD you
get a bunch of fizzles. i think other places i have heard that you can leave brass on
are the shady swashbuckler cave and, um, well i guess that's all that i remember, heh.

oh, one other place you can solo is at the arena zone, there are 2 aviak guards who are
pretty weak for their con. there's supposedly a single spawn somewhere too, but i didn't
spend a lot of time there.
